Paragraph: Because of the strong aggregation strength , PffBB-n equipped with long alkyl side chains shows enhanced ordered molecular packing and good crystallinity as revealed by X-ray diffraction studies.

2. Strong aggregation strength: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n. It can be considered as a "Property Value" entity with the property being "strong aggregation strength".
3. Enhanced ordered molecular packing: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n as revealed by X-ray diffraction studies. It can be considered as a "Property Value" entity with the property being "enhanced ordered molecular packing".
4. Good crystallinity: This is a property or characteristic of PffBB-n as revealed by X-ray diffraction studies. It can be considered as a "Property Value" entity with the property being "good crystallinity".
